camera.name: Jedeye_2 3D Camera
camera.pipelinea: pipeline: rtspsrc location=rtsp://192.168.60.1:554/live4 latency=200 ! queue ! rtph264depay ! h264parse ! queue ! decodebin ! videoconvert
camera.pipelineb: pipeline: rtspsrc location=rtsp://192.168.60.1:554/live4 ! rtph264depay ! h264parse ! avdec_h264 ! videoconvert
camera.pipeline: pipeline: rtspsrc location=rtsp://192.168.60.1:554/live4 latency=200 ! rtpjpegdepay ! jpegdec ! videoconvert
camera.3D_comment1: horizontalOffset adjusts the parallax, positive or negative.
camera.3D_comment2: verticalOffset corrects vertical alignment of left and right image views.
